pullRequest.title: Enable all Jenkins jobs triggering for committers
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR #12319 introduced an issue that prevents anyone from triggering seed jobs and dependency check job from GitHub pull requests. That PR fixes the issue and makes it available for all beam committers. Other jobs are not affected and still can be triggered by anyone.  At the same time apache GitHub organization is removed from GHPRB plugin admins.
Apache LDAP server is used as a source of the beam committers' GitHub usernames. The seed job is extended to fetch the usernames and populate GHPRB user whitelists for the jobs that are not publically triggerable.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

commit.message: installing python requirements for committers generator in seed job
proceed even if committers generation failed
added exception handling & proper cert path for committers generator
fixed error hanlding and configured logger for committers generator
copying seed config to standalone seed
fixing spotless formatting & adding license header
fixed error handling - unstable seed job if committers generator failed
